wiki.weaponss: Various firearms and those that he creates.
wiki.powers: Regeneration, even after death; uncanny marksmanship ability; can "technoform" mechanical components into a variety of configurations, most commonly firearms
wiki.creators: this has not been updated yet
wiki.bio_text: Native American John Greycrow is a former U.S. Army soldier who was a member of [[Fury, Nick|Nick Fury]]'s squad during World War II. Greycrow was executed by firing squad after his murder and scalping of eight fellow officers; however he was subsequently resurrected due to his mutant regenerative ability. Coming into the employ of geneticist [[Mister Sinister]], Greycrow became field leader of Sinister's [[Marauders (mutants)|Marauders]], the superhuman assassins responsible for massacring the underground mutant [[Morlocks]] community. Greycrow also shares a past with [[Gambit]] of the [[X-Men]], outside of Gambit's involvement with the Marauders, though specific details are still being collated. Though the Marauders were all seemingly killed during a [[Inferno (event)|demonic invasion of New York City]], Sinister possesses the technology to perpetually clone them from samples of their DNA.
